data.eml:eml: Twelve new species and four new records of Stenoloba Staudinger 1892 from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Bryophilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Han, H. L., Kononenko, V. S. (2018): Twelve new species and four new records of Stenoloba Staudinger 1892 from China (Lepidoptera, Noctuidae: Bryophilinae). Zootaxa 4388 (3): 301-327, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.3.1
